channel.title: Rs3server | back again
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://oldrs3.com/images/logo.png[/img] [/center]
[center] [size=12pt]RS3SERVER IS BACK AGAIN
RS3SERVER WAS ONE OF THE FIRST FEW RSPS WHICH USED TO HAVE AROUND 500 PLAYERS ONLINE AVERAGE
DUE TO VARIOUS ISSUES, IT WAS DOWN FOR A FEW MONTHS
WITH THE COMMITMENT OF OLD OWNERS AND CODERS, IT IS REVIVED ONCE AGAIN
JOIN THIS ADVENTURE WHERE YOU WILL BE NEVER LEFT BEHIND[/size]
Links
Homepage - http://oldrs3.com/
Forum - http://oldrs3.com/forum/
Play now - http://oldrs3.com/rs3client.jar [/center]
[center][b][size=14pt]Special features [/size] [size=12pt]100% working, authentic Dungeoneering 3 modes - Normal, Ironman, Hardcore Ironman Grand Exchange All working bosses All working minigames 100+ Achievements Working Quests Prestige system Highscores 100% working skills Very smooth PKing[/size]
[/b] [img]http://s7.postimg.org/th1vuhm7v/rsadv1.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimg.org/d8lnl0ddn/rsadv2.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimg.org/akrlwwuyj/rsadv3.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimg.org/605fhzb97/rsadv4.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimg.org/5el1zm5kr/rsadv5.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimg.org/fuwko7f7f/Screen_Shot_2015_12_30_at_11_35_30_AM.png[/img]
[img]http://s27.postimg.org/6btv2hu0j/dungdung.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]DON'T WAIT, START YOUR ADVENTURE NOW[/size][/b][/center] [center] [b] Links[/b]
Homepage - http://oldrs3.com/ Forum - http://oldrs3.com/forum/ Play now - http://oldrs3.com/rs3client.jar [/center]

item.title: Rs3server | back again
item.dc:creator: @Samtheman5009 Samtheman5009
item.description:
@Samtheman5009 wrote:

Added new updates:

Auto-thieving option
Caves
Trivia
Ironman points shop

auto donation

auto vote

highscores

and much more

join rs3server.com today

Read full topic

item.title: Rs3server | back again
item.dc:creator: @oldrs3 oldrs3
item.description:
@oldrs3 wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:5, topic:554243”][quote author=oldrs3 link=topic=673166.msg4501579#msg4501579 date=1451458429]

Another Ruse

Probably the least likely to succeed too XD
I think they have like 7 owners now lol. One of them is away all the time, other one just fudges up the source/forums.
Shouldn’t have the name RS3server either just saying.

Anyways this isn’t going anywhere they switch their base every week :palm:

We quadrupled in our player base in just 2 days of release. Thanks for your “encouragement”.
[/quote]

just saying though RS3server was mostly staff since 2008, and still today has all players as staff members …[/quote]
Do you not realise there has been a big change in terms of staff base? Only a few of the staff are actually old staff. We get rid off the leeches like someone (cough cough) and now we’re starting fresh.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs3server | back again
item.dc:creator: @hxze hxze
item.description:
@hxze wrote:

Their playerbase is the staff team, that’s it.

Read full topic
